title: Add Bhatoa Traders branding images (logo + hero banner)

requirements.summary: Add generated Bhatoa Traders logo and hero banner as static assets and ensure they render in the existing header/footer and hero UI locations without responsive layout issues.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in the deployed build at the exact paths and are served without 404s: /assets/generated/bhatoa-traders-logo.dim_512x512.png and /assets/generated/bhatoa-traders-hero.dim_1600x600.png
The logo image is 512x512 and the hero banner image is 1600x600
Both images render correctly in the existing UI locations (header/footer logo and hero section banner) without layout breakage on mobile and desktop

file_operations.description: Add the Bhatoa Traders wordmark logo image asset as a static file with exact dimensions 512x512, matching the required filename and served from /assets/generated/bhatoa-traders-logo.dim_512x512.png.
Add the Bhatoa Traders hero banner image asset as a static file with exact dimensions 1600x600, matching the required filename and served from /assets/generated/bhatoa-traders-hero.dim_1600x600.png.

Verify the existing UI wiring continues to reference the exact generated asset paths for the header/footer logo and hero banner, and adjust only layout-related classes if needed to prevent stretching/cropping and avoid mobile/desktop layout breakage.
